channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: This is the moment South Korea's President Yoon Suk Yeol declared emergency martial law prompting large demonstrations in Seoul. South Korea's parliament has since voted to block the president's move. #SouthKorea #YoonSukYeol #MartialLaw #Parliament #Poli

item.title: Crowds gathered at South Korea's parliament after the country's President Yoon Suk Yeol declared emergency martial law - lawmakers have since voted to block the move. #SouthKorea #YoonSukYeol #MartialLaw #Parliament #Politics #Seoul #News #BBCNews

item.title: BBC reporter joined shocked protesters after South Korea's President Yoon Suk Yeol declared emergency martial law. The country's parliament has since voted to block the president's move but the military have said it will maintain martial law until lifted
